downloadTitle: Tech planning guide for deploying frontline solutions
downloadDescription: This white paper is for technical teams involved in deploying Microsoft 365 and line-of-business applications for a frontline, mobile-only workforce.

downloadFile.name: Tech planning guide for deploying frontline solns-v1FINAL.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/2/c/92c9bae3-9cc0-4aea-951b-d1191d3ce8df/Tech planning guide for deploying frontline solns-v1FINAL.pdf

detailsSection:
The purpose of this white paper is to help technical teams plan and deploy Microsoft’s frontline solution in the context of their organization’s existing deployment infrastructure and core business applications. 
The white paper is organized sequentially to help the reader build an understanding of the inputs and factors affecting deployment decisions before covering the recommended deployment steps and configuration options.
detailsSection_file_name: Tech planning guide for deploying frontline solns-v1FINAL.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: • The download is available in PDF format.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
